summary: This is an email from Audrey Strauss to an unnamed recipient, reporting that letters exchanged between Bruce Green and Judge Berman in case 19 Cr. 490 have been docketed. The email includes attachments of the letters and appears to be internal DOJ communication regarding case filings.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Sender of the email reporting that letters between Bruce Green and Judge Berman have been docketed in case 19 Cr. 490.

persons.name: Bruce Green
persons.context: Author of one of the letters exchanged with Judge Berman regarding case 19 Cr. 490, as referenced in the email subject and attachment.

persons.name: Judge Berman
persons.context: Recipient/author of a letter exchange with Bruce Green regarding case 19 Cr. 490, as referenced in the email subject and attachment.

persons.name: Ted
persons.context: Reported that both letters between Bruce Green and Judge Berman have been docketed, according to the email.

connections.description: Exchanged letters regarding case 19 Cr. 490, which have been docketed according to the email.
Ted reported information to Audrey Strauss about the docketing of letters in case 19 Cr. 490.

events.title: Letters docketed in case 19 Cr. 490
events.description: Letters exchanged between Bruce Green and Judge Berman regarding case 19 Cr. 490 were reported as docketed.

keyFacts: The email references case 19 Cr. 490, which is likely related to Jeffrey Epstein's criminal case.
Letters between Bruce Green (a professor) and Judge Berman were exchanged and docketed in September 2019.
Audrey Strauss of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was involved in tracking this correspondence.
The email shows internal DOJ communication about case filings and judicial correspondence.
